page.title: 12 Social Events
page.content: Throughout{1985}the two villages in the area will hold annual events. {JUNE}Hay making,a major event for all. {JULY }Agricultural shows,many children have the day off school to attend this family outing. {AUGUST }Charity Week {SEPTEMBER }Live Aid Concert in support of ETHOPIA FAMINE APPEAL,it raised over a thousand pounds. {OCTOBER }Local lad killed on motor cycle, the whole village mourns. {NOVEMBER }GUY FAWKES celebrations, bonfire and firework display by the schools PTA. {DECEMBER }School Christmas parties, local services,carol singers. Other social attractions include Whist Drives,Bingo,school outings and walks. In season fishing,game shoots and fox hunts remain popular,the latter an elitist pass-time.
